column7: Good an solid with good service
column9: Have Been there 4 times now and as Such texted the menu and was never disappointed. In addition they have a large selection of beer on tap so I can only recommend l.

Went for a quick meal, a hot summer afternoon so pretty empty. We had their famous meatballs and a texas chilli burger. Very nice staff, nice presentation of the food which was good but not special. Good selection on beer and wine.

column7: Sweet potato fries and Pilsner are a must
column9: Awesome Sweet potato fries. House Pilsner is really nice and you can easily have 2 drinks. Nice cosy place. Please make sure to reserve your table on the weekend nights.

I went there because I read they offer gluten free food. The waiter told me that they could adjust any of the dishes. They also have gluten free bread for the burgers. They are also aware of contamination. My burger was very tasty and also...More

Our oldest daughter picked Harrys in Lund for her birthday dinner party for the family.
We had a great time, enjoyed excellent food and attentive service for several hours. The youngest participant at 8 years was as happy with his burger as the oldest participant...More
Cozy place near the train station. Okey menu with good food. The same with the drinks. Very popular during the after work hours. Especially in may before the summer.
I had the best soup ever!!! Il definately come back for more and the stuff was super friendly. Keep up the good work.
The best freakin burger in the region not speak about the venison Filet plate ! Poor boy can go rich boy in a minute
My mind the burger and The burgers on My mind ! I Dont drink but i sure eat hahahahahahah . Five Star burgers no diggety yall . The Fries are killin The game !
